name: hAI! Friend MR
summary:
Meet Your Perfect AI Companion!

Transform how you connect and care with hAI! Friend MR, your ultimate AI-powered friend designed for VR and AR. Create a lifelike, animated avatar using a photograph of someone special and personalize their appearance and personality to craft the perfect companion. Powered by advanced conversational AI, your friend is multilingual, empathetic, and always ready to chat.

Whether you’re seeking a confidant, a mental wellness guide, or simply a friendly presence, your hAI!...
